name: Hag
body:
### Welcome to HAG website.
The Historical Address Geocoder(HAG)is a Python package for automating the geocoding process for the 'Digitising Scotland' project. The geocoding process will involve probability-matching historical records with contemporary addresses, designing an automating system to assist manual matching of historical addresses, and producing a small area geography from historical addresses. 

```
 A Beta version of HAG package will be available by the end of September 2014.
```
